 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַל‎</span> **verb** ==marry, rule over== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJAAdAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAkAB0AAAJihI+pyxvfogSvzptqwLy7nYEeoonlJCqnsUYQkx6xZI1YbaNvTu98g8vAOj7SjHKEzUq+oCvGLBaB05Ysqapqso5s9GtlLTdfZPTD/V3TarER22V5zXA0xRtG6abtvv//VwAAOw=="> = ***own, possess***, especially a wife or concubine; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLAAUAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAsABQAAAJxhI+py+0fWohPTWrBtRfXPiXgJpLfiKEhMlZa2B3x66FnSs5mvsocvtIFecMeDSgjGnZKFrOYpDylxmOUiqRdl5pS77lsah0z61hY+3rMZrHpXAWFi5FpdP7D0o3lWHmu57Q2FnbnsjB4qLjI2Oi4UAAAOw=="> ***to be rich***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***bâlu***</u></abbr>, ***rule*** [[BDB#COT|COT]]<sup>Gloss</sup>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּעַל‎</span> ***take possession of wife*** or ***concubine***) **\*\***[[Jer.3.14|Jer 3:14]]; [[Jer.31.32|Jer 31:32]] AW JosKi Thes, comparing Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be disguated***, derive from II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַל‎</span> loathe (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>); so Buhl: Gie Du Co in [[Jer.31.32|Jer 31:32]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּעַלְתִּי‎</span> (treating [[Jer.3.14|Jer 3:14]] as I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעַל‎</span>). — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** [[Mal.2.11|Mal 2:11]] + 6 t.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִבְעַל‎</span> [[Isa.62.5|Isa 62:5]] (twice in verse); ***Participle*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּעֲלַיִךְ‎</span> [[Isa.54.5|Isa 54:5]] passive feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעוּלָה‎</span> [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]] + 3 t.; — 

**1.** ***marry*** [[Gen.20.3|Gen 20:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.21.13|Deut 21:13]]; [[Deut.22.22|Deut 22:22]]; [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]]; [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]]; [[Isa.54.5|Isa 54:5]]; [[Isa.62.4|Isa 62:4]]; [[Isa.62.5|Isa 62:5]] (twice in verse); [[Mal.2.11|Mal 2:11]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Jer.3.14|Jer 3:14]]; [[Jer.31.32|Jer 31:32]] ***be lord (husband) over***. 

**2.** ***rule over*** [[1Chr.4.22|1Chr 4:22]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>) [[Isa.26.13|Isa 26:13]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּבָּעֵל‎</span> [[Prov.30.23|Prov 30:23]]; [[Isa.62.4|Isa 62:4]] ***be married***.
